definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The guide misled the tourists in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 向导在森林里给旅游者带错了路。

sentences.english: Among all the bridges, the most popular among tourists are the hanging bridges.
sentences.chinese: 在所有的桥中，最受旅游者欢迎的就是绳索吊桥。

sentences.english: The deputy of these travelers was despatched to take the news to the travel agency.
sentences.chinese: 这些旅游者的代理人被派遣去送口信给旅行社。
夏威夷吸引了许多旅游者。

sentences.english: Mt. Tai which is located in Shandong Province attracts thousands of tourists every year.
sentences.chinese: 泰山位于山东省，每年吸引着成千上万的旅游者。

sentences.english: Tourists and Londoners basked in warm sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 旅游者和伦敦居民沐浴着和煦的阳光。

sentences.english: The Sydeny Olympics attracted more than one million new travelers into Australia.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼奥运会吸引了超过一百万新的旅游者到澳大利亚。

sentences.english: Tourists slip goods through without paying taxes.
sentences.chinese: 旅游者偷带货物过关不纳税。

sentences.english: A group of travelers lost their way in the forest, and the police found then the next day.
sentences.chinese: 一群旅游者在森林里迷了路，警察第二天才找到他们。

sentences.english: In Maine, boiled lobster is popular with local citizens and travelers.
sentences.chinese: 在缅因州，当地人及旅游者都喜欢吃水煮大龙虾。

sentences.english: For lack of distinct culture，some places will not attract tourists any more.
sentences.chinese: 由于缺乏独特的文化，一些地方不再吸引旅游者。

sentences.english: Simultaneously the citizen's recreational action has spurred the out comers'participation.
sentences.chinese: 市民的环城游憩活动同时又带动了外来旅游者的参与。

sentences.english: The tourist attached labels to all his bags.
sentences.chinese: 旅游者把他的行李都系上标签。

sentences.english: The Sidney Olympics  attracted more than one million new travelers into Australia.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼运动会吸引了大约一百万旅游者到澳大利亚。

sentences.english: She guided the tourists around the city.
sentences.chinese: 她引着旅游者参观了这个城市。

sentences.english: Let partners assured satisfaction for tourists, and I was operating objectives.
sentences.chinese: 让合作者放心，让旅游者满意，是我社的经营目标。

definition: a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
